// 2nd Logic

#include<iostream>
#include<climits>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
 
int main()
{
    ll t,i,j,q1,q2,q3,q4,n,flag,ans;
	ll a[100000],max_so_far =0, curr_sum=0;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		flag=0;

		scanf("%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld", &n,&q1,&q2,&q3,&q4);
		for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
		{
			scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
			if(a[i] > 0)
				flag++;
		}
		
		if(flag == 0)
		{
			ans= INT_MIN;
			for ( i = 0; i < n; ++i)
			{
				if(a[i]==q1 || a[i]==q2 || a[i]==q3 || a[i]==q4 )
					continue;
				
				 if(a[i]>ans)
				 	ans=a[i];
			}
			printf("%lld\n", ans);
		}
		else
		{
			max_so_far = curr_sum= 0;
			for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
			{
				if(a[i]==q1 || a[i]==q2 || a[i]==q3 || a[i]==q4 )
				{
					// Any of these Numbers are not to be included in 
					// Contiguous Subarray.
					curr_sum=0;
					continue;
				}	
				else 
				{
					curr_sum+=a[i];
					if(curr_sum < 0)
						curr_sum = 0;
					if(max_so_far < curr_sum)
						max_so_far = curr_sum;
				}
			}
			printf("%lld\n", max_so_far);
		}
    
	}
    return 0;
}
